website_summaries.verdict: Provides real data such as breathing wavelengths to ease the minds of worrisome parents.
pros: Can customize to include alerts that detect crying in addition to movement
Stays put on babies who frequently move around in their sleep
High marks for clear images and ease of use in regards to the application
cons: Set up may take longer than other devices, but is well worth the time

website_summaries.verdict: This video monitor not only gives you clear video and 2-way audio but it also monitors your baby's breathing and notifies you of changes.
pros: Monitor offers night vision HD video, 2-way audio, and monitors breathing in real time
Notifications alert you if breathing changes or baby cries or wakes
Relays image through WiFi to your phone
cons: Not good for travel, since camera must be mounted to the wall

website_summaries.verdict: This first-rate portable baby monitor provides HD video that you can quickly access on your smartphone or tablet.
pros: Boasts both real-time breathing monitoring and night-vision HD video capabilities
Works in conjunction with a mobile app that enables you to receive instant alerts anywhere you go
Does not require any wearables, wires, or mats
cons: Sound quality leaves much to be desired
May be tough to connect the monitor to WiFi

customer_reviews.title: Great Customet Service from CEO
customer_reviews.text: I had originally posted a 1-star review, and the CEO contacted me directly. I had thought the breathing monitoring technology to be bogus, but he explained it in thorough detail, as well as provided me with analytics and assurance the technology works—even saved info from my unit and my daughter’s activity the night before. I had a scare when my daughter was face down in the middle of the night, and the unit didn’t notify me of any change in breathing. He gave me his personal contact as well, and encouraged me to call for any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: After using this Camera for 1 year I received an email from the company stating they were going out of business and would No longer be able to support the cocoon cam app. I was instructed to download the manufactures app to still be able to live stream. After spending 3 hours trying to get the new app to work we found out through other online reviews that this new app has NO sound!!! How do you use a baby monitor with NO sound! So upset with cocoon cam, they did a lot of people dirty. We will now have to purchase a new video baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S

customer_reviews.title: Worthless cam that has been discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these a out a year ago, they are no longer in business so their app no longer works, they suggested another app that has none of the features from their app (That hardly worked to begin with) and the sound in the new app doesnt work, which means I've spent $400 on two cameras that I cant use. I've already contacted an attorney about a class action lawsuit. This is outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed it while it lasted, but the company is going out of business and the app is no longer supported. Many of the features have been removed over the past few months and finally the company is killing the app and any further support at the end of this month. We only got to use it for 6 months. Now we have to research baby monitors all over again, and come up with the $$$ to buy a new one. I'm pissed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Data Hog
customer_reviews.text: This camera was installed for 14 days and has used 500GB of upload during that time. It constantly uploads to the cloud, even when there is no activity in the room at all. The constant upload rate is 3.2 mbps!!! IF YOU HAVE INTERNET DATA LIMITS, DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy 😣
customer_reviews.text: The camera app doesn’t exist anymore. We’re now using an app that doesn’t do what it was intended. No breathing monitoring, doesn’t track sleep wake up times or sleep times. The worst. I wish we would have bought a different one. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Grunick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I used to like this camera even though it had some flaws like delay and evenly once I awhile you had to re program it, I t didn’t have a temperature also, all that I didn’t mind, I liked it because it had a daily swaddle story that I liked , what got me to review it a 1 star was that the company just emailed us that they are stopping the app as of 5/31/2020 and the camera manufacturer app will be what we should have instead, I tried connecting it but it doesn’t work, very disappointed If you have this Camera and are experiencing the same you should join the Facebook group COCOON CAM UNOFFICIAL
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: shutting down the app!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much with our daughter, but they have chosen to no longer have the app that has all these features as of May 31st 2020, manufacturers app has no sound on it that is all they have offered customers and they didn't even notify us of the change. I found out about it from my Facebook mommy group. No email nothing from the company. I feel like we paid a lot of money for nothing now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilkin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I did love this camera, but the company closed down and the features of the camera - the whole reason we bought it - will no longer be available. I might as well bought a $25 camera. We had to buy two new camera that had the features we need for each of our kids rooms. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beware of new software change
customer_reviews.text: When this camera works its perfect for my needs but it constantly goes offline and its a hassle to connected again to the software. This month i received an email stating that they were going to discontinue their software and that i would have to upload a third party app in order to use the camera. The third party app has 2.0 out of 5 stars so you could already tell how good the transition will be. The third party app doesnt offer the same characteristics as the original app such as breathing and other configurations. Complete waste of money . Now i have a $150 useless camera.
customer_reviews.author: Santy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy, Not as great as it once was
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that they have shut the doors down and we all been sent off to some BS cam viewer. WE (ALL CUSTOMERS) cant see the baby's breathing, can't even see with night vision anymore. Definitely had a great product and then kick it down the road and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: BLACK12SILVER

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this! Company went under and no longer supports the app to use camera!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. They just discontinued hosting the camera
customer_reviews.text: We no longer receive any alerts and the new app is completely terrible. No refunds will be issued per what the company sent out. Very disappointing as now we have to buy new cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Grossman

customer_reviews.title: out of business as of May 31st 2020 ! Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Company is stopping the service of the camera, so it won't work anymore. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Celas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! - Features advertised no longer work
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I use to love these cameras until the company abandoned ship and discontinued their app. They sent all their users to a different app which makes ALL of the features listed unusable - sound, two-way speaker, alerts, night vision, motion detection, and breathing detection ALL gone. IF and I mean it when I say IF you get a connection to this other app you will only have video and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: RIrwin

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installing and amazing technology
customer_reviews.text: We love Cocoon Cam. It was very easy to set up. The instructions are very simple and easy to follow. Once we had it installed and viewed the image through the our iPhone it just gave us a piece of mind that it was one more thing a nervous new parent does not have to worry about. The technology is amazing. We love the fact that it is no touch and it eliminates anything that would disrupts the baby from sleeping. I would highly recommend this product to anyone having a new born.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Albanese

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: ⚠️ DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!! I ABSOLUTELY CANNOT BELIEVE AMAZON IS CONTINUING TO SELL THIS CAMERA!!! The app no longer works and they’ve transferred to a regular security cam app that doesn’t even work!! And no way of getting any of stuff it Used to do anyways like stories or breathing detection! Completely false advertising to be selling this!! And definitely not worth the money!!! You can go buy a regular security cam for $50 and it would probably work even better than this one! HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED 😡
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Gamayo

customer_reviews.title: Just find something else
customer_reviews.text: You will not be happy with this product. Company is out of business. They tell you to use another app and that apps doesn't have any of the feature Cocoon had. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Company discontinued service - Do not buy this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great monitor until May 2020 when the company suddenly notified us that they were discontinuing service. We were extremely disappointed as we depended on the monitor. Do NOT buy this monitor as it is basically a brick now. I am adding this review in the hopes that people will see it and not spend their money on it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: THEY’RE OUT OF BUSINESS.
customer_reviews.text: Camera won’t stay connected to the phone for more than 2 days. Now it won’t connect at all. Tried calling their customer service. They’re out of business. Be wary buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: Ughhhh
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before our baby was born and had everything up. When we got home with our baby we noticed it wasn’t working, then we get an email from the company saying they are going out of business. Now we can’t even get it to turn on. Definitely would not tell anyone to get this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Love

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - COCOON WENT OUT OF BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: Got an email from them yesterday that they will no longer be supporting the camera. I received instructions on where I can use the camera from their manufacturer. Their app is discontinued. No more breath monitoring. UPDATE - DO NOT BUY - they have gone out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nothing More than a Camera Now
customer_reviews.text: The company is no longer in business and we received an email that they are no longer supporting their app that monitored breathing and other important features that led us to purchase this monitor. They pointed us to another app to use which did not have that functionality so this is now just a typical camera which is overpriced without the added functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Faber

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! This company is going out of business and their app will no longer work with the camera. The factory app is just a security camera and doesn’t have the alert features! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The app was terrible, and they are now saying they won’t support the app starting 5/31. Now I have to unmount the current one and install a new one. Nonsense!
customer_reviews.author: ohanse

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The company is getting rid of there app and having you use a new one which does not have the breathing feature. Also does not warn you when your little one is moving like the old app. If it wasn't for this I really liked the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Becca T

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Horrible. Company went out of business and is leaving all its users without support without warning. Stops working randomly. Random external devices try to hack into it every day. DO NOT BUY. AMAZON SHOULD DE-lLIST THIS PRODUCT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This was great until it stopped working. This product should no longer be sold since it wont work.
customer_reviews.author: yanna8988

customer_reviews.title: Camera never connects or works...shop around
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of fighting with this thing I wanted give an honest review. It works, if you can get it setup...IF... Wired, wireless it has been a cluster....it is not worth the money for continuing aggravation. We have several other cameras that work much better. Look around and find something else...
customer_reviews.author: WP Verhines

customer_reviews.title: APP NO LONGER WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great until the company went out of business and no longer supports the app as of May 31, 2020. I can't believe they are still trying to sell it on Amazon! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE customer service. Emailed 3 times and not one response. Do NOT buy this camera as they disabled the app and the manufacturer app does not work right.
customer_reviews.author: kyle coble

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Shameful that this product is still listed. As others have said, company is going "in a different direction" as of May 31, 2020 and the app won't be supported. DO NOT BUY. Amazon should remove this listing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Support team went out now I can't even use this camera. The company folded and now I'm stuck with a useless camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera ever
customer_reviews.text: Since i purchased i havent been able to use it it does not connect to the wifi only when plugged into the router will it connect, once i take it off its gone. I purchased in December and have been trying to use it since then and have been unsuccessful. It doesnt pair with the phone and i follow all the prompts
customer_reviews.author: isabella malouf

customer_reviews.title: App no longer supported by the company
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I we got an email yesterday stating the company will no longer support the application and direct you to a third party application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company going out of business May 2020!!!
customer_reviews.text: This had been a great camera, but we just found it the company is going under. The app will no longer work!!! "We regret to inform you that in light of current circumstances, we will no longer be able to support the Cocoon Cam app after May 31st, 2020. We are a small company and are compelled to make this decision as we move in a different direction with the business."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer supported by Cocoon cam
customer_reviews.text: Camera no longer works as described by original features b/c they no longer are in company. They said wansview was supposed to pick it up, but lost most features like night vision, breathing, sound, etc. Neither company will help to resolve issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT NOTE: AS OF MAY 31 2020, COCOON CAM IS ENDING SUPPORT FOR THEIR MOBILE APP. So, probably time to choose another baby monitor
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Posa

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - company shut down and some 2 star third party app runs it now and it doesn’t connect. Only had the cam for a year - but another one and don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! COMPANY GOING OUT OF BUSINESS!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I really liked this camera until the recent closure of the company. They offered a new app to use the camera with, which is super slow, has no sound or breathing monitor, and the video quality is terrible. This is now essentially a poor security camera, NOT a baby monitor. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase: no longer supported!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera about nine months ago. It has worked alright most of the time, but it often takes a while to load the video feed and pick up the baby's breathing rate. I do like the alerts when she's waking up, crying, etc. However, we just got an email saying they're no longer supporting the product after May 31, 2020. We can download the camera manufacturer's app to stream the video, but we'll no longer have any of the features we purchased this product to get. Pretty disappointing and I'm surprised that Amazon is still selling the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Because of this pandemic, they are not able to monitor. Now no notifications, NO NIGHT VISION nothing. Total crap. And my baby is just 6 months old. Why they are selling it, if they can’t manage to give service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rahul raj

customer_reviews.title: Company going under do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Company has completely discontinued any support for this product and are disabling their app (the only way to use this product) on may 31st. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Company no longer supporting their camera.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed to receive an email that this company is no longer supporting their device. We originally purchased the camera to be able to take out of town when staying with family, and use in our backyard. Syncing to WiFi has always been a pain, and now the new app won’t sync either.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Reisdorf

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - APP NO LONGER SUPPORTED
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! App is no longer supported by this sketchy company! Just up and abandoned this what was otherwise wonderful product as they decided to “take the business in another direction” - TRASH. Amazon please take this listing down immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sessoms

customer_reviews.title: Going out of business. They say due to the pandemic
customer_reviews.text: This camera is going out of business due to the pandemic. Please don't buy it due to the fact that you won't be able to use it to the full capacity anymore..written May 2nd 2020. I received an email from them today stating so.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Tee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I can’t believe this is still up for sale. I loved this camera until the company up and gave us parents short notice and discontinued everything about the camera and app we all loved. There was no way I was downloading the app that the camera was suppose to connect to, didn’t sound safe at all! Don’t waste your time, find something else.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Product is no longer supported!
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this product 1 star because the company completely dissolved without warning. It was disgraceful and left customers high and dry with a product they were relying on for their baby. Basically one day you received an email from the company claiming it won’t work by month end. That’s it. Company is not heard from again and no direct way to reach them. This product should not be sold as it won’t end doing even 3/4’s of the things it was so strongly advertised to do. Very disappointed. Loved the camera when it worked, hate that this is what I am left with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: GOING OUT OF BUSINESS - APP NO LONGER SUPPORTED
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS - COMPANY GOING OUT OF BUSINESS - APP WILL NO LONGER BE SUPPORTED Worked good until the company last minute told us the app would no longer be Supported after May. Smart beats is similar look into that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Just received an email that they are no longer supporting the cacoon cam app after may 31,2020 and we have to use the manufacturer app. Very disappointed We regret to inform you that in light of current circumstances, we will no longer be able to support the Cocoon Cam app after May 31st, 2020. We are a small company and are compelled to make this decision as we move in a different direction with the business.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Grim

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera and just set it up for our son this weekend and it does not work. There’s no customer service number to call even or anyone to help exchange or solve the issues we are having with the camera. 0/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company has closed, app is no longer available.
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent app that was shut off by a not great company. I found that the app was extremely helpful in providing notifications and updates throughout the night when you’re the most worried about a small baby. However, the company has sense moved on and no longer supports the Concoon app. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lbplykewhoa

customer_reviews.title: OUT OF BUSINESS
customer_reviews.text: Out of business less then a year after purchased thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: woo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It was a good cam but the company bankrupt and I'm being left with a device that's completely useless because the app doesn't even work anymore. I spent 129 bucks and I can throw it out now. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: App not available after May 31st.
customer_reviews.text: We love the function of this camera and app. Unfortunately, we just found out that after a year and a half of having it, the app is closing and our camera is useless. Now we have to invest in a whole new monitor. I am really upset. It's too late to return it and we are out over $100. We did have issues with the app not always working and with the camera tilting. But overall it gave us piece of mind and we liked being able to access it on our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Company
customer_reviews.text: Terrible company.... Take your money and then stop offering service and close up shop just to open under a different company name so you will buy again...
customer_reviews.author: AZMomBlogger

customer_reviews.title: Do Not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. Lasted less than a year before it went out. Couldn’t fix. Says app no longer available in « your » region. Tried multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of business
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! They just announced that the app is no longer available after May 31 because they went out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but now Hate it. Bad Updates have made this useless
customer_reviews.text: We used to love this app but the recent updates have made it completely useless!! The servers are always down, the live stream constantly goes offline. Our camera is no longer alerting us in the middle of the night because it goes offline and we don't know it until our daughter is crying and we have to run across the house. We've recommended this camera to friends and family and have since told everyone to not bother. Yes we have the latest update, 4.0.7. so dont respond telling me to update. We will be contacting the company directly for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cocoon Cam company shut down
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BOTHER BUYING THIS!!! The company has dissolved itself, abandoned its prior customers, and lauched a new product call Cocoon Health. All the awards and reviews for tgis new product are actually from the old Cocoon Cam. Not a great business model. But if you buy this, you will NOT have any tech support
customer_reviews.author: Cbakeman

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This company has shut down and will no longer support the app that is used for this cam. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product in use for 3 months. First we had connection issues. Then the breathing monitor stopped working. Then they stopped doing Swaddle Stories so that we could no longer see our baby’s movements from the night before. Now it doesn’t connect at all to our phones. They say to contact their IT via email but I have yet to get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hoefler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It was great but they are stopping the app and it will become useless
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: They no longer support the camera. No breathing monitor.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t support it anymore. There is an app you can use but it doesn’t have a breathing monitor. I am so furious by this. I want my money back. I don’t care how long ago I bought this. This was a significant investment and I want my money back. I paid 200 a pop for these and I got 2 of them and they’re useless without the breathing monitor.
customer_reviews.author: JoelDT

customer_reviews.title: App no longer supported! Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: As of June 1st the app will no longer be supported you will have to download a different app that if you can even get to work does not have any of the features of this camera except video!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you care about having any internet bandwidth left do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This camera EATS bandwidth. For the first time ever I maxed out my 1TB Comcast cap due to this app. I have been running 3 nest cams for years and never even went above 500 gb. Meaning that this camera used 500 gb alone. It must be sending uncompressed data to their servers. Its an immense amount of data that made me give more money to Comcast. If you are a Comcast customer DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA. I tried to bring this up with their support but they never cared to respond. It's a shame because the tech was cool the few times it worked. Again DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Horribly unreliable and constantly uploading to the cloud
customer_reviews.text: The app constantly crashes, or shows you previous footage loops. The manufacturer always says to text them if you have problems but their troubleshooting usually results in "reinstall the app" If you expect a reliable monitor, like the angelcare we had before, do NOT but this. It also constantly streams the video feed to their servers to the tune of 3mbps which can easily work out to 25gb/day. So you better have unlimited!
customer_reviews.author: Jerkson

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy! Check Google Play Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. They disconnected the app so now my camera is completely useless! Looks like they have zero intention of fixing this issue so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfTheShe-beast

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this camera while it was supported by original Coccon app, now they decided not to support the app and provide a different app that work horrible!!!! No breathing monitor, you cannot hear the child or talk to the child back. Video get freezed 20 time per night . Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! Frozen image and no notification baby is crying. Looked peacefully sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ! The image was frozen on my phone. Thought my 8 week old was sleeping peacefully according to what I could see and hear and he was actually screaming his head off. Thank god I heard his muffled cries from the other floor. WiFi is not reliable enough to not have any notification on the app that Says bad or poor connection or something. I can’t even explain how traumatizing this was for me and my little one.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: APP no longer supported
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product. Purchased 2 years ago and now getting messages that the app is no longer supported.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is awesome! I’ve previously had a Samsung and Levana baby monitor and the picture quality is not good and they cost more than this one. The breathing monitor took a little adjusting of the camera position (it needed to be lower) to get it to work, but it works great once baby falls asleep and stops moving. The time lapse Swaddle Stories are cute and it notifies you when baby falls asleep, when they cry, etc. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LVKIM

customer_reviews.title: This product will not work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This product is discontinued and is not supported by the manufacturer. You would be purchasing a useless camera. The app WILL NOT work. Amazon has been issuing refunds for this product, which is generous on their part; however, reselling the returned cameras is GREEDY. Cocoon Cam and Cocoon Health is no more. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cocoon cam is a lifesaver, literally!
customer_reviews.text: We got Cocoon Cam to keep an eye on my 6 year old who has seizures during the night. I love this product. The app alerts me when he wakes up, his breathing changes and starts to move. I can pull up the live feed and watch him to make sure he is ok. Even if he is home with a babysitter, I can check on him and send someone in if he needs help. I can also see how often he wakes up during the night and how long he is awake before falling back to sleep. I love this product and would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Support
customer_reviews.text: Camera kept disconnecting. I troubleshooted everything with my internet before I would comtact their support and they were absolutley no help. The best they could tell me is to reboot it. Now I got and email from them saying "We regret to inform you that in light of current circumstances, we will no longer be able to support the Cocoon Cam app after May 31st, 2020. We are a small company and are compelled to make this decision as we move in a different direction with the business."
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Best solution to our worries
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been really impressed with the Cocoon Cam. Was easy to install. Now we both can keep a close eye on our baby ,even if we arent in the same room. I love that it detects his respiratory rate. also the daily swaddle stories and event log is very helpful for us to keep track of his nightly behavior. We have solid proof of his constant scratching and inability to sleep all night. It was the best choice to get this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and nice features
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor! I enjoy being able to check in on my baby while I’m at work, and the breathing monitoring gives me more peace of mind. The picture quality is excellent both in day and night lighting. I love that this monitor has background sound on your phone, and that it alerts you that baby is crying whether or not the app is open. One drawback is that there are times that it goes offline, which can be expected from any device. For that reason I also keep a cheap sound-only monitor in our bedroom just incase. Also, the app does drain your phone battery, so make sure to plug your phone in overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but love it
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before buying this and I am very happy with our choice. The lower price made me think that it was a cheap Chinese product but I was wrong. The app is really good! It loads super fast and we love the daily swaddle stories (it’s a time lapse of your child sleeping or not sleeping through the day). I would recommend this baby camera. Improvement: add a cable management feature as the cord running down the wall, right next to the crib is dangerous. I ended up buying another cable management solution for this and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Seeff

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - APP NO LONGER AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: Cocoon Cam will quit supporting the app after May 31, 2020! We will not have any of the features available that we purchased this camera for. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: App will no longer be supported after May 31, 2020
customer_reviews.text: The app will no longer be supported after May 31, 2020. We went out on a limb and bought a no-name product that seemed promising. We are sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mills

customer_reviews.title: Company Abandoning Product
customer_reviews.text: Cocoon has decided that they are no longer going to support their product and as of May 31st you lose all of the features you paid $150 for and you're left with a cheap basic IP camera.
customer_reviews.author: tradami

customer_reviews.title: See, hear and check baby's breathing all at once.
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can see, hear and check baby's breathing all in one unit. I considered other baby monitors but none of them had ALL these features rolled into one. My husband and I can both watch our babe on each of our phones and my husband even gets to talk to baby in the crib from work! I did have an issue with the camera and the support team emailed and texted me within 10 minutes. Issue was completely resolved within a day. Absolutely recommend the Cocoon Cam and will use this for the next baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera snaps off the mount TWICE and you have to re-pair it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: The camera has broken off the mount TWICE. They resent a part and it happened again in less than a year of use. It constantly disconnects and you have to re-pair the device. It's extremely loud when you re-pair and will wake any sleeping baby. BUY ANOTHER DEVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: went out of business
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer use this camera, they attempted to allow their customers to be able reset factory settings and use is it an IP tool, but the camera will not factory reset after 30s of holding the reset button. Now here I am on a weekend, not able to watch my baby sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: App no longer supported
customer_reviews.text: As of apr 24th, this product is no longer supported by it's software. The main functionality is gone, and it's now just an overpriced camera. Be aware if you are looking to purchase a monitor with more functionality that that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best of all worlds. Don’t waste your money on buying a more expensive camera. Does exactly what it needs to do (easy to install, great quality, easy to use app, etc) and it’s cost-effective.
customer_reviews.author: ELMichaelson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY  - COMPANY NO LONGER SUPPORTS THE CAMERA/APP
customer_reviews.text: A total SCAM. DO NOT BUY. you will be buying a useless camera
customer_reviews.author: alden

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service/unable to connect camera
customer_reviews.text: I installed the app and followed instructions to connect the cam via Ethernet to my router. The app crashed repeatedly and made me start from scratch over and over. I contacted cocoon customer service and they responded a day later asking for my cameras ID number and my email. I gave them the information and here I am 5 days later with no response. Returning the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great options, prompt customer support, sound isn't that loud.
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have! I haven't had a video monitor before, but it's amazing that I can share access to my mom who lives far away and doesn't get to see our child often at all. I noticed the breathing monitor wasn't working. I contacted support and they were prompt to fix the issue, which ended up being old firmware and a quick fix. I wish the monitor was louder on my phone. It seems to not use my phone's speaker and uses the handheld speaker instead. Since it's not using the phones loud speaker, it's not as loud as I wish it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: The camera was very easy to set up. The app has an intuitive user interface an the steps involved were straightforward. Having to set up the camera with an ethernet cable to our modem was a little bit annoying, but it was so quick that it really was no big deal in the end (and apparently there is another set-up method anyway...) The unit itself was pleasantly light and easy to place. The camera quality was average. I didn't experience any latency in the video. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: David Schertzer

customer_reviews.title: Like it don’t love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera at first because it gave me a piece of mind that I could see and hear my daughter and track her breathing. I have now had the monitor for a year and the notifications are not accurate and sometimes I don’t even receive any notifications if my daughter is crying. The camera also has red lights on the lens that scares my daughter and she will randomly start crying saying the monster eyes are looking at her. The clarity is OKAY. It’s only 720fp for the price it should be more. If I could return this camera I would.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle bucarelo

customer_reviews.title: Look at the app rating at Google play store 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: The app is terrible. My wife's phone plays sound when the app is on mute but my phone doesn't. My wife's phone receives notifications but I can't on my phone. The breathing rate monitor rarely works. I have to restart the app frequently because the video is glitchy. Overall very disappointing. I recommend looking at the Google play store and look at the app rating prior to buying a camera. The app is only 2 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - product should not be sold.
customer_reviews.text: This product should be discontinued. Why is it still being offered for sale?! Manufacture no longer supporting app - camera is now useless and does not have the features we paid for just two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley L

customer_reviews.title: POOR
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Camra since April and out of no where the company just drops of the face of the earth and states they no longer are "supporting" the app.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Company out of business
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor stopped working and it hasn't even been a year. Don't you know the company has gone out of business so there is no collaborating and getting replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Winters

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!!! I just bought the camera and everything worked amazing just got an email today that they are cancelling their app and all support for the cam! So it is now completely useless!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: When searching for a baby monitor, Cocoon Cam has all the features we were looking for! We are so happy with Cocoon Cam and the way it helps us keep our baby safe while she’s asleep. The sound and video quality are great and we love the notifications it gives when our baby falls asleep and you can see her breathing graph, when she wakes up, and when she is crying. Highly recommend this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stops working
customer_reviews.text: I thought the image quality was great, its designed specifically to monitor baby's unlike general home cams and its much easier to position as a result. We got 2 months of use until it stopped working. It might be due to a software update, hard to say. Worked with tech support, leaving the cam plugged in to ethernet for a day while they tried to fix it from their end. Tried resetting but that didn't fix the issue. Annoying that a product stops working even though the indicator lights and such seem to indicate it is functioning. Went with an Amazon cam to replace and its rock solid dependable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Okumura

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: 2h later, still unable to connect to the WiFi. So, if the only reliable option is the ethernet cable, it pretty much defeats the purpose. So I will just return it. Not useful whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on here must be fake. I’m a savvy consumer and read through them. The one thing I didn’t do is check the App Store and look at the reviews there (big mistake). This thing is junk. It doesn’t work at all as advertised. The app is glitchy and terrible. The video quality it great if the thing would actually show you video in real time. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

product_meta.title: Cocoon Cam Plus Baby Breathing and Video Monitor 2018 Version - Discontinued by Manufacturer
product_meta.description: Know that your baby is breathing. Cocoon Cam is the only monitor that shows your baby’s breathing rate in real time, gives you instant alerts to know when they're waking or crying, and has secure HD video and two-way audio. Plus, Cocoon Cam is contact-free, with no uncomfortable wearables for your baby to kick off. We have released updated firmware that resolves all these issues and it will automatically be installed on any new camera installation. We have set a 2-5 sec delay for our video buffer so that we can improve the user experience and provide a very reliable video streaming experience. Before Setup Please make sure that you have the following before we start the setup process: 1. Cocoon Cam with Wall Mount 2. Cocoon Cam Power Cord (Please don't use other power cords) 3. Ethernet Cord 4. Physical Access to your Router 5. Your 2.4 GHz network WiFi Username and Password
feature_bullets: (Updated 2019) KNOW YOUR BABY IS BREATHING with real-time breathing rate and BPM display and night vision HD video. VALIDATED BY TOP PEDIATRICIANS including IRB-approved studies at Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford and UC San Diego.
(Updated 2019) SEE THE MOVEMENT OF YOUR BABY with Vision Mode. A heatmap shows exactly where your Cocoon Cam is detecting your baby’s movement.
SLEEP when your baby does. INSTANT ALERTS will notify you if baby's breathing changes, baby is crying or beginning to wake. Get the PEACE OF MIND you need to actually rest when your baby does.
ALL-IN-ONE MONITOR, NO WEARABLES NEEDED. See and know your baby is breathing without any wearables, wires, or mats. Easy to use
(Updated 2019) ENHANCED SECURITY WITH HTTPS ENCRYPTED VIDEO, AUDIO, AND VITALS, and instant alerts in our FREE app. SEE, HEAR, AND TALK to your baby right on your phone.

NOTE: Cocoon Cam should be centered on the long side of the crib, 3 feet above the mattress. Secure the camera stand to the drywall anchors using screws. Adjust the camera to point down and have a birds eye view of the mattress

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars1,566 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
